title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document all functional and non-functional requirements for the SmartPetFeeder project, including user stories, use cases, technical specifications, data models, and system architecture.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software modules, communication protocols, and data flow.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for the SmartPetFeeder, including mobile and web applications, considering usability and accessibility.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services for the SmartPetFeeder, including APIs, data processing, and integration with third-party services.

title: Develop Frontend Applications
description: Implement the frontend applications for the SmartPetFeeder, including mobile and web applications, based on the designed user interface.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for the SmartPetFeeder, considering scalability and performance.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures for the SmartPetFeeder, including authentication, authorization, data encryption, and secure communication protocols.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the SmartPetFeeder project, including automated testing, build, and deployment processes.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for the SmartPetFeeder, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, ensuring high-quality software.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the SmartPetFeeder, including installation instructions, user manuals, and API documentation.
